feed.title: speedata Publisher changelog (en)
feed.subtitle: New revisions for download and changelog.

entry.title: Version 3.1.10
entry.content: Enhance Lua CSV reader

entry.title: Version 3.1.9
entry.content: New Lua based pre-processing

entry.title: Version 3.1.8
entry.content: New xpath function round, padding-* in Column

entry.title: Version 3.1.7
entry.content: Various bugfixes (Grid, Fontface)

entry.title: Version 3.1.6
entry.content: Various bugfixes

entry.title: Version 3.1.5
entry.content: New feature: DefineTextformat/tab=hspace change tab into a stretching space

entry.title: Version 3.1.4
entry.content: Bugfix: Image/page does not work with href

entry.title: Version 3.1.3
entry.content: New xpath function <tt>sd:dimexpr()</tt> for calculation with dimensions

entry.title: Version 3.1.2
entry.content: Bugfix for underline.

entry.title: Version 3.1.1
entry.content: ZUGFeRD integration, new commands AttachFile and AddSearchpath

entry.title: Version 3.0.0
entry.content: Release version 3.0

entry.title: Version 2.9.15
entry.content: Force pagetype if provided at NewPage, strip NL/Tab at beginning / end of paragraph.

entry.title: Version 2.9.14
entry.content: Allow font-family setting in CSS for custom element.

entry.title: Version 2.9.13
entry.content: Bugfix numerical entities in data. New: base64 decode, filecontents.

entry.title: Version 2.9.12
entry.content: Bugfix PlaceObject/hreference=right and absolute positioning

entry.title: Version 2.9.11
entry.content: Lazy evaluation of defaultcolor / Pagetype, minor bugfixes.

entry.title: Version 2.9.10
entry.content: New command: Groupcontents to insert a group in a Td. Bugfix XPath parser, sd:current-framenumber().

entry.title: Version 2.9.9
entry.content: Lazy evaluation of Grid in Pagetype (#130), bugfix nested tables (#129), improved Initials (color), bugfix cursor movement (#128)

entry.title: Version 2.9.8
entry.content: Bugfix XML attributes with quotation marks

entry.title: Version 2.9.7
entry.content: New command Initial.

entry.title: Version 2.9.6
entry.content: Enhancements on Image/bleed="auto", extra allocation margin on PlaceObject

entry.title: Version 2.9.5
entry.content: Absolute positioning now allows allocate="yes".

entry.title: Version 2.9.5
entry.content: New internal variables _bleed, _pagewidth, _pageheight

entry.title: Version 2.9.5
entry.content: New attribute bleed="..." on Image.

entry.title: Version 2.9.4
entry.content: Box with backgroundcolor="-" only allocates cells.

entry.title: Version 2.9.3
entry.content: Bugfix resetmarks, new attribute defaultcolor on Pagetype, remove obsolete commands.

entry.title: Version 2.9.2
entry.content: Bugfix for processing instructions in the XML file (will be ignored now)

entry.title: Version 2.9.2
entry.content: New feature: style <span> and other elemnts in data with CSS.

entry.title: Version 2.9.1
entry.content: Bugfix: top-distance in Tr

entry.title: Version 2.8.1
entry.content: Fix hotfolder (variable directory)

entry.title: Version 2.7.13
entry.content: Use tempdir setting to calculate imagecache.

entry.title: Version 2.7.12
entry.content: New command DefineFontalias

entry.title: Version 2.7.12
entry.content: Bugfixes for multipage tables

entry.title: Version 2.7.11
entry.content: Makeindex: make page number attribute variable

entry.title: Version 2.7.11
entry.content: Bugfix: objects with ht > 0 and “jump to next row”

entry.title: Version 2.7.11
entry.content: Remove images from cache when 404.

entry.title: Version 2.7.10
entry.content: Allow setting of error correction level for QR-codes.

entry.title: Version 2.7.9
entry.content: allowbreak=" " does not break at a hyphen character anymore.

entry.title: Version 2.7.9
entry.content: NoBreak default is now 'keeptogether' which prevents a line break.

entry.title: Version 2.7.8
entry.content: Change U+2011 (NON-BREAKING HYPHEN) to U+002D (HYPHEN-MINUS) and don't insert a break.

entry.title: Version 2.7.7
entry.content: Don't clear image cache before first run

entry.title: Version 2.7.6
entry.content: Better image cache - don't re-load images during the same run.

entry.title: Version 2.7.5
entry.content: New method for image caching. Rename Image/maxsize to visiblebox.

entry.title: Version 2.7.4
entry.content: New command Trace for debugging selections. Remove show-* on Options.

entry.title: Version 2.7.4
entry.content: Behavior change with NextRow, remove command EmptyLine, compatibility switch with Compatibility.

entry.title: Version 2.7.4
entry.content: New Option: defaultarea.

entry.title: Version 2.7.3
entry.content: New API /v0/statusfile/<id> to get the file publisher.status.

entry.title: Version 2.7.2
entry.content: When PlaceObject goes past the right margin (for example in full width text), go to next row.

entry.title: Version 2.7.1
entry.content: Fix error when fallback image is not found

entry.title: Version 2.7.1
entry.content: Emtpy attributes in Attribute don't give a table value

entry.title: Version 2.7.0
entry.content: Disable German layoutrules, bugfix (#104) distribution error

entry.title: Version 2.6.1
entry.content: Bugfix for Mac and Linux ZIP files

entry.title: Version 2.5.13
entry.content: Bugfix for large tables (> 200 pages?)

entry.title: Version 2.5.12
entry.content: Bugfixes for paragraph shape, move LuaTeX binary to different directory

entry.title: Version 2.5.11
entry.content: Add padding-* to Stylesheet, allow image styling with CSS (padding only), add padding-* to Image

entry.title: Version 2.5.10
entry.content: Many improvements for Text/Output and allocate="yes"

entry.title: Version 2.5.10
entry.content: Remove all German commands from the manual

entry.title: Version 2.5.10
entry.content: New attributes for Text: fontface, color and textformat

entry.title: Version 2.5.10
entry.content: Improvements to the documentation (spelling fixes), Language string "English (Great Britan)" corrected

entry.title: Version 2.5.9
entry.content: Bugfix related to “jump to next area” and multipage table/

entry.title: Version 2.5.8
entry.content: Bugfix get remaining height jumps to last line, even if “full”

entry.title: Version 2.5.7
entry.content: Bugfix allocation on non-integer columns

entry.title: Version 2.5.6
entry.content: Remove obsolete command ProcessRecord, add limit option for ProcessNode, bugfix Output/Text paragraph shape (#89)

entry.title: Version 2.5.5
entry.content: Various bugfixes / future objects and tables

entry.title: Version 2.5.4
entry.content: Allow control over size of background-text in Td.

entry.title: Version 2.5.3
entry.content: Include bugfixes from 2.4.4

entry.title: Version 2.5.2
entry.content: (2.4.2) A few bugfixes related to sd:current-framenumber(), minheight in Textblock and looking for next free row.

entry.title: Version 2.5.1
entry.content: Interpret <sub> and <sup> in data.

entry.title: Version 2.5.1
entry.content: Bugfix: pagetype and NewPage, version assertion in Layout tag

entry.title: Version 2.4.4
entry.content: Various bugfixes: leaders disappear on a linebreak, Nobreak allows setting for font family, escape attribute contents, fix for bad images.

entry.title: Version 2.4.3
entry.content: Bugfix related to an improper fix in 2.4.2 / find next free row for an object

entry.title: Version 2.4.2
entry.content: A few bugfixes related to sd:current-framenumber(), minheight in Textblock and looking for next free row.

entry.title: Version 2.4.1
entry.content: Bugfix: pagetype and NewPage, version assertion in Layout tag

entry.title: Version 2.4.0
entry.content: Release version 2.4.0

entry.title: Version 2.3.77
entry.content: Fallback filename for image (in case of image not found)

entry.title: Version 2.3.76
entry.content: New API /v0/layout/<id> to get the layout.xml

entry.title: Version 2.3.75
entry.content: New API /v0/data/<id> to get the data.xml

entry.title: Version 2.3.75
entry.content: Bugfix empty value should not make a space.

entry.title: Version 2.3.74
entry.content: New API /v0/status to get all statuses

entry.title: Version 2.3.73
entry.content: Allow frame number in sd:allocated()

entry.title: Version 2.3.72
entry.content: Bugfix: element names with dash accpeted

entry.title: Version 2.3.71
entry.content: New xpath function sd:allocated(x,y,name)

entry.title: Version 2.3.70
entry.content: Messages can set error code on error

entry.title: Version 2.3.69
entry.content: Bugfix indent and parshape with allocate="auto"

entry.title: Version 2.3.68
entry.content: Bugfix: API /v0/pdf/<id> must wait for the pdf file to finish. Error happens with mutliple runs

entry.title: Version 2.3.67
entry.content: ForAll has a new attribute: start to give the starting point (default: 1)

entry.title: Version 2.3.66
entry.content: Change mechanism on image wrapping, only partly enabled.

entry.title: Version 2.3.65
entry.content: Various bugfixes with HTML output and Output/Text

entry.title: Version 2.3.64
entry.content: Underline in data respects CSS style

entry.title: Version 2.3.63
entry.content: Bufgfix line height calculation with Output/Text and allocation = auto

entry.title: Version 2.3.62
entry.content: Various bugfixes: paragraph shape, server wait until run finished

entry.title: Version 2.3.61
entry.content: New feature U/dashed="yes"

entry.title: Version 2.3.60
entry.content: Fehlerkorrektur für HTML-Tabellen und sp --ignore-case / Schriftarten

entry.title: Version 2.3.59
entry.content: Bugfix HTML tables

entry.title: Version 2.3.58
entry.content: Experimental HTML tables

entry.title: Version 2.3.57
entry.content: New sp option --ignore-case for case insensitive file loading

entry.title: Version 2.3.56
entry.content: Bufgix Ouptut/allocate="auto"

entry.title: Version 2.3.55
entry.content: halign on PlaceObject

entry.title: Version 2.3.55
entry.content: Much better wrap around with Output allocate="auto".

entry.title: Version 2.3.54
entry.content: New XPath function sd:randomitem(Value, Value, Value)

entry.title: Version 2.3.53
entry.content: Nobreak allows to cut text with ...

entry.title: Version 2.3.53
entry.content: PDF producer is set to LuaTeX, creator is set to speedata Publisher - version number

entry.title: Version 2.3.53
entry.content: Various bugfixes

entry.title: Version 2.3.52
entry.content: Various bugfixes: multi paragraph Output with par shape, decode-html

entry.title: Version 2.3.51
entry.content: Temporary directory configurable.

entry.title: Version 2.3.50
entry.content: Dashed rules

entry.title: Version 2.3.50
entry.content: Leaders in HSpace

entry.title: Version 2.3.48
entry.content: Server mode: id always start with a non-zero value.

entry.title: Version 2.3.47
entry.content: New PDFOption Duplex

entry.title: Version 2.3.46
entry.content: Vertical spacing between grid cells

entry.title: Version 2.3.46
entry.content: PDF options PrintScaling and PickTrayByPDFSize

entry.title: Version 2.3.45
entry.content: API call /v0/status returns time stamp-

entry.title: Version 2.3.44
entry.content: Write warnings to status file

entry.title: Version 2.3.43
entry.content: Options / imagenotfound: error or warning

entry.title: Version 2.3.42
entry.content: Access foo/@bar attributes on sub elements

entry.title: Version 2.3.42
entry.content: New shape: Circle

entry.title: Version 2.3.41
entry.content: New xpath function substring()

entry.title: Version 2.3.40
entry.content: Bugfix when reading a config file

entry.title: Version 2.3.39
entry.content: Server mode honors jobname from publisher.cfg

entry.title: Version 2.3.38
entry.content: New XPath function 'string-length()', bug fixes, prepare for LuaTeX 0.85

entry.title: Version 2.3.37
entry.content: Bugfix for broken utf8/status file

entry.title: Version 2.3.36
entry.content: Workaround for broken publisher.status file

entry.title: Version 2.3.36
entry.content: Table and vreference=bottom works.

entry.title: Version 2.3.35
entry.content: Schematron rules in RelaxNG schema

entry.title: Version 2.3.35
entry.content: Image/href can omit file: scheme

entry.title: Version 2.3.34
entry.content: Bugfix: configuration file requires end of line marker on last line

entry.title: Version 2.3.33
entry.content: Possible bug fix with LoadDataset/Windows

entry.title: Version 2.3.32
entry.content: Bugfix: height calculation in tables with row where break-below=no

entry.title: Version 2.3.32
entry.content: Much better table debugging with --trace

entry.title: Version 2.3.32
entry.content: Dynamic table heads can be removed

entry.title: Version 2.3.32
entry.content: Action / Mark can have multiple entries

entry.title: Version 2.3.31
entry.content: New xpath function 'contains()'

entry.title: Version 2.3.30
entry.content: New API call /v0/delete/id to remove the publishing request

entry.title: Version 2.3.30
entry.content: New xpath function sd:keep-alternating() to re-use the current alternating value.

entry.title: Version 2.3.29
entry.content: Bugfix with servermode on windows

entry.title: Version 2.3.28
entry.content: Textblock can have a minimum height.

entry.title: Version 2.3.28
entry.content: Option crop can take a length.

entry.title: Version 2.3.27
entry.content: Bugfix for Overlay command: Image can be stacked on another element.

entry.title: Version 2.3.26
entry.content: New command Overlay to stack objects.

entry.title: Version 2.3.25
entry.content: New command line option --extra-xml and new configuration option extraxml to add additional XML files to the layout instructions (similar to xinclude).

entry.title: Version 2.3.25
entry.content: New configuration option var to add variables.

entry.title: Version 2.3.25
entry.content: New server mode api parameter vars to send additional variables to the publishing process.

entry.title: Version 2.3.25
entry.content: New command line option --varsfile to define more variables.

entry.title: Version 2.3.24
entry.content: Add option »trimmarks«, show the trim box when show-grid is turned on.

entry.title: Version 2.3.23
entry.content: Bugfix width calculation in the grid

entry.title: Version 2.3.22
entry.content: Bugfix with dx and nx in SetGrid

entry.title: Version 2.3.21
entry.content: New option crop for pages with a tight cropbox.

entry.title: Version 2.3.20
entry.content: Bugfix: width Table and Rule and grid distance

entry.title: Version 2.3.19
entry.content: PositioningFrames can now use the current data ({@attrib} for example)

entry.title: Version 2.3.19
entry.content: Bugfix/workaround for an issue introduced in 2.3.18 in multi line Td cells.

entry.title: Version 2.3.18
entry.content: Bugfixes: replace() and $1, $2, ... / multi line <Td align="center">...</Td> contents

entry.title: Version 2.3.17
entry.content: Experimental garbage collection, in effect with SetVariable.

entry.title: Version 2.3.16
entry.content: Command NoBreak to disable a line break within.

entry.title: Version 2.3.15
entry.content: API changes: make jobname configurable through parameter, better error messages.

entry.title: Version 2.3.14
entry.content: Server-mode: /v0/pdf/<id> returns the PDF

entry.title: Version 2.3.14
entry.content: Server-mode: add timestamp for /v0/publish/<id>

entry.title: Version 2.3.12
entry.content: New api call /available -> 200 OK, /v0/publish returns 201

entry.title: Version 2.3.11
entry.content: Grid distance horizontal can be set.

entry.title: Version 2.3.10
entry.content: Bugfix: index entry without contents crashes the publisher.

entry.title: Version 2.3.9
entry.content: Bugfixes (sp server mode protocol file, infinite loop on malformed utf8 data)

entry.title: Version 2.3.9
entry.content: Empty attributes (attr="") are treated as nil. empty(@attr) now returns true().

entry.title: Version 2.3.8
entry.content: Rotate (steps of 90°) for images

entry.title: Version 2.3.8
entry.content: New xpath function sd:aspectratio('imgname.png')

entry.title: Version 2.3.8
entry.content: Simple if/then/else expressions in XPath

entry.title: Version 2.3.7
entry.content: Background text for table cells (td)

entry.title: Version 2.3.6
entry.content: publisher.status file contains the (error-)messages.

entry.title: Version 2.3.4
entry.content: Bugfix: spot colors apply to stroking and non-stroking operations

entry.title: Version 2.3.3
entry.content: Some CSS for rule, direct color definition.

entry.title: Version 2.3.2
entry.content: New server mode for remote publishing.

entry.title: Version 2.1.36
entry.content: Add all CSS level 3 colors (see http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/ for a list)

entry.title: Version 2.1.35
entry.content: Allow bookmarks on any level (experimental)

entry.title: Version 2.1.34
entry.content: New function sd:attr() to access attribute with a dynamically constructed name.

entry.title: Version 2.1.32
entry.content: XML parser / XInclude takes --extra-dir into account

entry.title: Version 2.1.28
entry.content: Allow specification of hyphen char in textformat.

entry.title: Version 2.1.27
entry.content: New example "mail merge"

entry.title: Version 2.1.26
entry.content: New command: Frame. Can be used inside PlaceObject to frame an object.

entry.title: Version 2.1.23
entry.content: Rounded corners on PlaceObject / Frame

entry.title: Version 2.1.22
entry.content: Transformations can be nested inside PlaceObject

entry.title: Version 2.1.21
entry.content: Custom spot colors

entry.title: Version 2.1.21
entry.content: Transformation origin for rotate and matrix (PlaceObject)

entry.title: Version 2.1.20
entry.content: Copy-of copys does not destroy the underlying content.

entry.title: Version 2.1.18
entry.content: A transformation matrix can be set on PlaceObject

entry.title: Version 2.1.16
entry.content: Don't break lines on / anymore, unless specified in allowbreaks="/".

entry.title: Version 2.1.15
entry.content: Experimental server-mode (/v0/format)

entry.title: Version 2.1.14
entry.content: Hyphenation = yes/no at DefineTextformat

entry.title: Version 2.1.13
entry.content: Basic version of tokenize() and replace(), basic server mode.

entry.title: Version 2.1.13
entry.content: Colors can have overprinting enabled.

entry.title: Version 2.1.13
entry.content: Spot colors (PANTONE and HKS)

entry.title: Version 2.1.12
entry.content: New command »Color« to switch to a different text color in text.

entry.title: Version 2.1.10
entry.content: Change behaviour of allowbreak=".." at Paragraph. Space must be made explicit.

entry.title: Version 2.1.10
entry.content: New xpath function sd:dummytext() and sd:loremipsum() for a sample text (lorem ipsum)

entry.title: Version 2.1.9
entry.content: XInclude rebirth

entry.title: Version 2.1.8
entry.content: Extend table rows (Tr) to re-use as table header.

entry.title: Version 2.1.8
entry.content: Merge pagenumbers now accept page ranges.

entry.title: Version 2.1.7
entry.content: Bugfix for table in table and alignment. align="right" didn't work.

entry.title: Version 2.1.6
entry.content: Experimental option 'allowbreak' on Paragraph to provide a list of characters where line break may occur.

entry.title: Version 2.1.6
entry.content: sp --quiet for console-less output

entry.title: Version 2.1.6
entry.content: Parallelise sp compare for much better performance.

entry.title: Version 2.1.5
entry.content: Bugfix table cells with align=center and a fixed width.

entry.title: Version 2.1.3
entry.content: Allow hyphenation in the second word in compound words such as longword-anotherlongword. Also enable line breaks after "/"

entry.title: Version 2.1.1
entry.content: New implemtation of paragraph splitting, should be completely backward compatible.

entry.title: Version 2.1.0
entry.content: New behaviour of contents in table cells (Td). The rules of HTML (see HTML block elements) are followed as far as possible.
